description: Welcome to Falcon Hill - centrally located townhome community in Coquitlam, just minutes to shopping at Newport Village, Coq Crunch, SkyTrain, and easy highway access. This spacious 3 bedroom home has been extensively updated with a new roof, vinyl plank flooring, custom kitchen cabinets with quartz countertops and a gas stove. The tastefully renovated bathrooms include quartz countertops and a walk-in shower in the primary ensuite. Additional upgrades include a new washer & dryer, furnace with A/C, updated plumbing and a stone gas fireplace. Enjoy East-facing mountain views from the balcony and primary bedroom, or relax in your private backyard complete with upgraded retaining walls, fencing, and low-maintenance turf-perfect for kids and entertaining. This home truly checks all the boxes!
